content: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" standalone="yes"?> <oembed>  <version>1.0</version>  <type>rich</type>  <provider_name>Confederación Sindical Internacional</provider_name>  <provider_url>http://www.ituc-csi.org</provider_url>  <title>Trade unions as advocates of quality apprenticeships: L20 briefing to the G20 Apprenticeships Conference</title>  <author_name>Philippe Gousenbourger</author_name>  <width>480</width>  <height>295</height>  <url>http://www.ituc-csi.org/trade-unions-as-advocates-of</url>  <html><h4 class='title'><a href='http://www.ituc-csi.org/trade-unions-as-advocates-of'>Trade unions as advocates of quality apprenticeships: L20 briefing to the G20 Apprenticeships Conference</a></h4><blockquote class='spip'> <p>For a number of reasons, apprenticeships, training and skill development as well as the certification of skills have become important issues for trade unions.<br class='autobr' /> For a number of reasons, apprenticeships, training and skill development as well as the certification of skills have become important issues for trade unions. The L20 is therefore joining the 2nd G20 Conference on ‘Promoting Quality Apprenticeships' on 25 February 2015 in Antalya. In doing so, it prepared the “Quality Apprenticeships – (...)</p> </blockquote> </html> </oembed>
